name: AccurARcy
description:
Test your accuracy, judgement and patience to the maximum with AccurARcy - (AR = Augmented Reality). AccurARcy is a one of a kind game/app. Take your aim, calculate and judge the movement of the target and when ready, tap to shoot a bullet and pop the bubble(s) in sight. Easy right? Well.... not so much. The targets spawn in various locations, ranging from close to far, and move around your environment. And you only get one chance, yes ONE chance to try and hit the target and increase your score. Think you can live up to the challenge? Think you got what it takes to get a really high score? Then download AccurARcy today for free, only in the App Store.

Features:
• High quality graphics
• Simple and easy to play
• An original app
• Extremely challenging and addictive!
